players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was killed on the first night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice that we need to keep a close eye on each other. It's important for us to work together and share any information we may have, no matter how small it seems."
You: "I'm concerned that one of us is hiding something. Let's all share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it seems, to help us figure out who among us is the mafioso."

Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and I trust that everyone else feels the same way. Let's continue working together and sharing any information we may have, no matter how small it seems, to help us figure out who among us is the mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Alice: "I'm concerned that one of us is hiding something. Let's all share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it seems, to help us figure out who among us is the mafioso."

Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and I trust that everyone else feels the same way. Let's continue working together and sharing any information we may have, no matter how small it seems, to help us figure out who among us is the mafioso."
